reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app does declare the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects various forms of data, including Personal Information, Non-Personal Information, and information related to Emergency-Related Services.
reply.reference: The Privacy Policy is used to inform users of our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information... https://subdial.app/privacy

source_documents.excerpt:
Provider.
If your Connected Device is used to contact an Emergency Service Provider, we may collect the following categories of personal information associated with the device:
- Information that directly identifies the owner or customary user of the device, such as your name, physical address, email address, and phone number.
- Precise geolocation of the Connected Device.
We do not use personal information collected through Emergency-Related Services, including information collected from Emerge...

Privacy Policy
Big Human built Subdial as a free app. This SERVICE is provided by Big Human at no cost and is intended for use AS IS.
This Privacy Policy is used to inform users of our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decides to use our Service.
The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal information associated with the device, including information that directly identifies the owner or user of the device, precise geolocation of the connected device, and log data such as device IP address, device name, operating system version, configuration of the app, and time and date of app use.

content: Information that directly identifies the owner or customary user of the device
Precise geolocation of the Connected Device
Log Data such as IP address, device name, operating system version, app configuration, time, and date of use

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the sections discussing the collection of personal information associated with the device, precise geolocation, and log data in the privacy policy document.
reply.reference: Information that directly identifies the owner or customary user of the device, Precise geolocation of the Connected Device, Log Data such as IP address, device name, operating system version, configuration of the app, and time and date of app use. URL: https://subdial.app/privacy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that if users provide personal information, it will be used for the purpose for which it was collected and for other related purposes determined by the app. It also states that information may be shared with noncommercial third parties after removing personal information. The app also collects personal information for Emergency-Related Services with a specified purpose.
reply.reference: we will use the information for the purpose for which it was collected and for other reasonably related purposes we determine are appropriate...Big Human will not sell, rent, trade, share or otherwise disclose your Personal Information to any third party for any other purpose. URL: https://subdial.app/privacy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users can opt-out of data collection or request deletion of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that users can request the deletion of personal information, and parents or guardians of children under 13 can also request the deletion of their child's information. Furthermore, the App ensures compliance with regulations such as COPPA.
reply.reference: If you are a parent or guardian and discover that your child under 13 years of age has obtained an account on the Service, then you may alert us at privacy@subdial.app and request that we delete that child’s personal information from our systems. URL: https://subdial.app/privacy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that individual Non-Personal Information is not shared with third parties, while aggregated data may be shared with noncommercial third parties for improvement purposes. No mention of sharing Personal Information is found within the document.
reply.reference: This information is for our internal review only and your individual Non-Personal Information is not shared with third parties. ... the aggregated data may be shared with other noncommercial third parties such as public or private service providers. URL: https://subdial.app/privacy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with other noncommercial third parties such as public or private service providers.

content: other noncommercial third parties such as public or private service providers

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app may share aggregated data with noncommercial third parties, like public or private service providers, but it explicitly mentions that it will not sell, rent, trade, or share personal information with third parties for any other purpose.
reply.reference: We may remove all Personal Information in order to aggregate such data and share the aggregated data with other noncommercial third parties such as public or private service providers, however, Big Human will not sell, rent, trade, share or otherwise disclose your Personal Information to any third party for any other purpose. URL: https://subdial.app/privacy
